TopicTitle: how do i change it so the default name for crafts is untitled space craft?

Articles.Content: what setting/code do i modify? if its a mod, please share. i dont know if this goes in mods, or in here, so can someone tell me how to change it from fly-safe (ugh) to untitled space craft, also is it possible to make it so it doesnt become untitled spacecraft 1, 2 etc, etc?
